casebody.data:
State
v.
Damario Montreal Coxton 121P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016.

Mr. Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, For Coxton, Damario Montreal.

Mr. David Elliott, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of September 2016 by Defendant-Appellant to Deem Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
